top_comments.comment: Well, we have to admit that Chucky is way sexier than Dave

comments_since_last_sample.body:
O.K the check tat I have seen in other media and thought looked a little silly but seeing it in the flesh so to speak hmm not so silly.

An interesting take.
I'd like to hear her cover don't talk to strangers or any cover of Dio.

Phil Collins wrote the original song due to the emotions following his first divorce. This song is something like "an alternative way for dealing with post-divorce depression". Suddenly, it's much spookier.
Your voice is not really to my taste but I find I keep watching your vids bc you pick pretty interesting songs and sometimes it all really clicks for me and think that was great
